name: Trash Simulator (saritasun)
description:
You are a bag of trash😀 - 

Running in an old trash factory🏭

Avoid the obstacles and other trash! ■

Rotating , Jumping, Form-changing to get to the end

The Assignment 2 of Creative Code Unity - Coding Art

Experimented with the functions like rotating, jumping, moving, new scene setup

*For the moving part, I set a forward speed and side-way speed to the player so it is moving forward automatically and could be moved left or right by wsad & ← → but it wasn't so sensitive at the beginning of the game idk why - 

*To jump above, press button "J"

*To pass through the small gap, press button "C" changing to a smaller player object so you can pass!

***Sometimes the functions like jump and change to smaller doesn't work - I few like they only work for once but I don't know if it is the code problem or my keyboard (I do have a really bad keyboard)
